text: Hi everyone, I was wondering about HubSpot page Optimization and Render block with third party JS, anyone has some ideas to share or tips to improve page speed? <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Optimizing-JS-and-Render-Blocking/m-p/405097#M40093> please comment here :slightly_smiling_face: thank you
Check this post for some great advice on performance optimalization: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/CMS-Development/A-place-to-gather-resources-issues-and-solutions-to-optimize/m-p/355145#M17562>
